about_the_game:
You happen to find yourself in a dungeon. The world around you is made entirely out of lines. Equipped with nothing, but a power to bend those lines, you are tasked with transforming the environment in order to complete various levels. Watchful eyes of the dungeon's architects will observe your performance and eventually let you out of the dungeon. But will you be satisfied? Or will you come back and improve solutions to prove to the architects that you are worthy of a place among them?

Features:

  • 50 mind-bending puzzles of various difficulty
  • Multiple solutions
  • Atmospheric Graphics
  • Simple controls
  • Ever-watching eyes
